trans-unit.source: Provides types that allow applications to read and write the components of an XPS document.
trans-unit.target: Fornece tipos que permitem aos aplicativos ler e gravar os componentes de um documento XPS.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the interfaces and the types that represent the major parts of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging> namespace provides control over the packaging process, including digital signatures and Digital Rights Management (DRM) of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documents.
trans-unit.target: Além das interfaces e os tipos que representam as principais partes de um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documento, o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging> namespace fornece controle sobre o processo de empacotamento, incluindo assinaturas digitais e gerenciamento de direitos digitais (DRM) de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documentos.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o XML Paper Specification (XPS) disponível para download em [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
